title: German newspaper 'bills' China for coronavirus as Americans sign up to sue Beijing
description: The most-read newspaper in Europe publishes an invoice for China to cover losses across the German economy while an American lawsuit "seeks billions of dollars in compensatory damages for those who have suffered personal injuries, wrongful deaths, property da…
